items.question: Is that a real baby in the show? It's body and eyes don't move much. Is it a dummy or a robot?
What song was played in a certain scene/episode?
items.answer: You can find a listing of the songs played during the television broadcast (NBC Rewind & DVD versions may differ), including scene descriptions, here: http://www.tvshowmusic.com/shows/fridaynightlights.htmlIf you are looking for one of the songs that have been changed for the NBC Rewind/DVD versions, try starting at: http://rescuerecords.net, as they seem to be the main source for the replacement music.
